mapper.insert: insert into mem_noti(noti_no, caller_mem_no, receiver_mem_no, noti_content, noti_type, noti_url) values(mem_noti_seq.nextval, #{callerMemNo}, #{receiverMemNo}, #{notiContent}, #{notiType}, #{notiUrl})
mapper.select: select N.*, M.mem_nick from mem_noti N left outer join mem M on N.caller_mem_no = M.mem_no where N.receiver_mem_no = #{memNo} and N.noti_create_date >= sysdate-14
mapper.update: update mem_noti set noti_read_date = sysdate where noti_no = #{notiNo}
